text:
Maintaining stock inward & outward register Dispensing the right medicine to patients Calling distributors to arrange the required medicines in right time Updating stock details in s/w Maintains the sale invoice bills & purchase bills Literature survey of the branded medicines Developing Parma network in distributorship Raise the order copy to the company for stock Maintaining the payments & ledgers details for parties Handling the international products details Searching the branded products with the available distributors in India Maintaining the international product list records
